title: Sight...unseen
creator_credit: Paul Davoud, Australian Science Education Project and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: Shows a range of educational activities at the North Rocks School for blind children. Braille music, braille typewriters and other tactile and mobility aids are demonstrated. Suitable for tertiary and teacher levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Davoud, Australian Science Education Project and ABC-TV (Australia)
